name: @kodey-ai/salesforce-mcp
description: Run SOQL queries to explore and retrieve Salesforce data. Inspect records, fields, and relationships from your workflow. Speed up reporting, auditing, and troubleshooting with fast, targeted results.

tools.name: soql_query
tools.title: Execute SOQL Query
tools.description: Execute SOQL queries on Salesforce and return results

query.description: SOQL query to execute (e.g., SELECT Id, Name FROM Account LIMIT 10)

tools.name: get_sobject_describe
tools.title: Describe Salesforce Object
tools.description: Get metadata about a Salesforce object (fields, relationships, etc.)

objectName.description: Salesforce object API name (e.g., Account, Contact, CustomObject__c)

tools.name: insert_record
tools.title: Insert Record
tools.description: Insert a new record into a Salesforce object. Provide the sobjectType and all field values directly as parameters (not wrapped in recordData).

sobjectType.description: The Salesforce object API name (e.g., Account, Contact, quotation__c)
